data.title: Alchetron, The Free Social Encyclopedia
data.meta_description: Fern Emmett (March 22, 1896  September 3, 1946) was an American film actress. She appeared in 212 films between 1930 and 1946. The following were with John Wayne Other films Actress 1947 The Trouble with Women as Landlady (uncredited) 1946 No Leave, No Love as Nurse (uncredited) 1946 Night and Da
data.text:
Tripti Joshi

(Editor)

I am a Teacher who started creating online content for my students from 2016 so that they can get access to free knowledge online.

Fern Emmett

Share on FacebookTweet on TwitterShare on LinkedInShare on Reddit
